overview: The children of Nexpa, a community of Michoacan 120 inhabitants, show us their free and transparent way of seeing life. The children interview the natives of their community; these speak of the founders of Nexpa and the history of the place. The documentary showsus  a different way of storytelling through the eyes and voices of children. It is a project full of tenderness in which children invite children from other cities to visit Nexpa.
title: Barra Nexpa
